name: open-sandbox
description: It is an open-source frontend library that creates a sandboxed environment for running code snippets, simulating a development environment directly within web applications. It is primarily designed for testing, experimentation, and educational purposes.

name: Oversees
description: A desktop application designed for comprehensive, real-time monitoring of hardware performance and system processes. It provides users with detailed insights into CPU, GPU, memory usage, Disks and other critical system metrics through an intuitive interface.

name: QR Code Controller
description: This project involves generating a QR code that, when scanned, allows users to connect to a WebSocket server built with Flask. It facilitates real-time communication between clients and the server, enabling interactive web applications.

name: Github Used Languages
description: The idea behind this project is to create a customizable chart that measures the usage of programming languages and/or tools from github profiles. You have a lot of control over what to include, from choosing which languages or tools to display, to defining the relevant file extensions, names, images, colors and more.
